meanings.sent1: The flowers outspring from the ground in spring.
meanings.sent2: I watched the rabbit outspring from its burrow.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party outsprung the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outsprung like a fountain of joy.
meanings.sent5: The idea outsprung in my mind like a spark igniting a fire.

meanings.sent1: The outspring of the river created a beautiful waterfall.
meanings.sent2: The outspring of new leaves signaled the arrival of summer.
meanings.sent3: The outspring of jokes at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: His creativity had an outspring that inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The outspring of emotions in the movie scene touched my heart deeply.
